tags.name: If Value
tags.desc:
Tests if {value} equals {testvalue}.
Available Operators: <>=, #, >, >=, <, <=, $ (Contains), !$ (Does not contain)

tags.name: If Value In List
tags.desc:
Tests if {value} is in the list of {testvalues}.
Optionally, you can wrap {value} and {testvalues} in double quotes.
tags.code:
~[if.hello in (hello,world)] true [else] false [/if]
~[if."goodbye" in ("hello","world")] true [else] false [/if]

tags.name: If Value Not In List
tags.desc:
Tests if {value} is not in the list of {testvalues}.
Optionally, you can wrap {value} and {testvalues} in double quotes.
tags.code:
~[if.hello not in (hello,world)] true [else] false [/if]
~[if.goodbye not in (hello,world)] true [else] false [/if]
tags.ex:
~[if.hello not in (hello,world)] true [else] false [/if]
~[if.goodbye not in (hello,world)] true [else] false [/if]

tags.name: If String contains Value
tags.desc:
Tests if {value} is in the {string}.
Optionally, you can wrap {value} and {string} in double quotes.
tags.code:
~[if."hello world" contains "bye"] true [else] false [/if]
~[if.hello world contains hello] true [else] false [/if]
tags.ex:
] true [else] false [/if]
~[if.hello world contains hello] true [else] false [/if]

tags.name: If String does not contain Value
tags.desc:
Tests if {value} is in the {string}.
Optionally, you can wrap {value} and {string} in double quotes.
tags.code:
~[if."hello world" does not contain "bye"] true [else] false [/if]
~[if.hello world does not contain hello] true [else] false [/if]
tags.ex:
] true [else] false [/if]
~[if.hello world does not contain hello] true [else] false [/if]

tags.name: If is a School
tags.desc: Renders content if the currently selected school is not the District Office.

tags.name: If District Office
tags.desc: Renders content if the District Office is currently selected.

tags.name: If District Office or Graduated Students
tags.desc: Renders content if at the District Office or Graduated Students.
tags.code: ~[if.dist.office.or.grad.students]District Office or Grad Students[else]Not District Office or Grad Students[/if]
tags.ex: ~[if.dist.office.or.grad.students]District Office or Grad Students[else]Not District Office or Grad Students[/if]

tags.name: If GPV
tags.desc: Renders contents of if statement if the {parameter} value matches the {expression}.

tags.name: If GUV
tags.desc: Renders contents of if statement if the {user_variable} value matches the {expression}.

tags.name: If Preference
tags.desc: Renders contents of if statement if the {prefname} value matches the {expression}.

tags.name: If Preference Year
tags.desc: Renders contents of if statement if the {prefname} value matches the {expression} & year.

tags.name: If User Preference
tags.desc: Renders contents of if statement if the {prefname} value matches the {expression} & user.

tags.name: If School Preference
tags.desc: Renders content if the {prefname} value matches the {expression} for the selected school.

tags.name: If SchoolID Preference
tags.desc: Renders content if the {prefname} value matches the {expression} for the selected school ID.

tags.name: If Year School Preference
tags.desc: Renders content if the {prefname} value matches the {expression} for the selected school & year.

tags.name: Check Dupe CC Failed
tags.desc: Used in the /admin/students/allenrollments.html page to detect overlapping enrollments.
tags.code: ~[if.CheckDupCC_Failed]Check Dupe CC Failed[else]Check Dupe CC Success[/if]
tags.ex: ~[if.CheckDupCC_Failed]Check Dupe CC Failed[else]Check Dupe CC Success[/if]

tags.name: If Enhanced Menu Enabled
tags.desc: Renders content if the user has the Enhanced Menu enabled.

tags.name: If New Look Enabled
tags.desc: Renders content if the client's operating system is Mac OS.

tags.name: Client OS - If Mac
tags.desc: Renders content if the client's operating system is Mac OS.

tags.name: Client OS - If Windows
tags.desc: Renders content if the client's operating system is Windows.

tags.name: Server State Abbreviation
tags.desc: Renders content if the server's state abbreviation  = {abbr}.

tags.name: Server OS - If Mac
tags.desc: Renders content if the server's operating system is Mac OS.

tags.name: Server OS - If MacX
tags.desc: Renders content if the server's operating system is Mac OSX.

tags.name: Server OS - If Windows
tags.desc: Renders content if the server's operating system is Windows.

tags.name: If is Teacher or Admin
tags.desc: Renders content if the user logged in is a teacher or admin.

tags.name: If is Student
tags.desc: Renders content if the user logged in to the parent portal is a student.

tags.name: If is Guardian
tags.desc: Renders content if the user logged in to the parent portal is a parent/guardian.

tags.name: If is Student or Guardian
tags.desc: Renders content if the user logged in to the parent portal is a student, parent, or guardian.

tags.name: If is Guardian and SSO is Enabled
tags.desc: Check if student, guardian, and guardian w SSO turned on is logged into the parent portal in PowerSchool.

tags.name: If Plugin is Enabled
tags.desc: Renders content if the plugin with Plugin Title is enabled.
tags.code: ~[if.plugin.isEnabled.META Customizations]META Customizations = Enabled[else]META Customizations Not Enabled[/if]
tags.ex: ~[if.plugin.isEnabled.META Customizations]META Customizations = Enabled[else]META Customizations Not Enabled[/if]

tags.name: If Security in Role
tags.desc: Renders content if the current user is part of one of groups/roles specified in the comma separated list.

tags.name: If Current Page Write Access
tags.desc: Tests if the currently logged in user has modify access to the current page.

tags.name: If Current Page View Access
tags.desc: Tests if the currently logged in user has view access to the current page.

tags.name: If Security Page Modification
tags.desc: Renders content if the current user only has modify access to pageurl.

tags.name: If Security Page View
tags.desc: Renders content if the current user only has view access to pageurl.

tags.name: If Security Page None
tags.desc: Renders content if the current user has no access to pageurl.

tags.name: If Security Can Modify Field
tags.desc: Tests if the currently logged in user has modify access to the {Table.Field}.

tags.name: If Security Can View Field
tags.desc: Tests if the currently logged in user has view access to the {Table.Field}.

tags.name: If Security Has No Access to Field
tags.desc: Tests if the currently logged in user has no access to the {Table.Field}.

tags.name: If Security Has No Access to Field
tags.desc:
Tests if the currently logged in user has no access to the {Table.Field} based on {Access_Level}.
Available Operators: >=, <=, !=, >, <, =
Available Access_level: NoAccess, ViewOnly, FullAccess

tags.name: If Modify Page Permissions
tags.desc: Renders content if the current user has modify current page permissions.

tags.name: If Configuration
tags.desc: Renders content if the server configuration variable matches the {expression}.

tags.name: If Is Prod
tags.desc: Renders content if the server is a production server.

tags.name: If Is Logged In
tags.desc: Renders content if the user is logged in.

tags.name: If Is Not Logged In
tags.desc: Renders content if the user is not logged in.
